Tein yksinkertaisen python koodin:

num1 = input('Enter first number: ')
num2 = input('Enter second number: ')

sum = float(num1) + float(num2)

print('The sum of {0} and {1} is {2}'.format(num1, num2, sum))

Tarkastelin binääriä komennolla:

xxd -b Untitled-1.py
